main_about_text:
I have always dreamed of being on stage — bringing people
joy, emotions and inspiration. But for a girl from a village
it seemed impossible.
When it was time to apply, I wanted to go to
a cultural college, but my parents didn’t let me. Then I
promised myself that the stage would still be a part of my
life.
And so it happened. At first there were performances and tours
with the song theatre, then — participation in a cover band.
Gradually I started being invited to host city
contests and festivals.
Day by day, year by year, I combined my main
job at school with my beloved work. But with all my heart
I dreamed that these two concepts — “work” and
“calling” — would finally merge.
In 2020 I completed my first courses for
masters of ceremonies and became not only a host of
events, but also a master of ceremonies — a person
who helps the most important moments in life
sound beautiful, touching, and truly
heartfelt
section2_intro:
I EXPERIENCE YOUR DAY TOGETHER WITH YOU.
“AS IF FOR MYSELF” - THIS IS NOT JUST A PHRASE.
IT'S A CREDO
fact_1:
I grew up on stage, always giving
energy and not planning
to stop
fact_2:
I love your celebrations more
than my own
fact_3:
In 3 years of working in Georgia, 150+ couples
said “Yes” to each other, and thousands
of guests said “THANK YOU” to me
fact_4:
Behind me is not only the work
of a host, but also organizer,
scriptwriter, assistant director
fact_5:
13 years a wife and 10 years a mom —
deserves the status of “happy mom
and happy wife”
fact_6:
Ukrainian abroad
with an active life position
fact_7:
I cannot swim, so
I don’t host pool events
fact_8:
I care about my inner world
and maintain balance to give
people an atmosphere of love and warmth
